title: Helpless (2U76)
text:
Set:	Mines of Moria
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Wraith
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	To play, spot Frodo and a Nazgul. Plays on Sam. Sam's game text does not apply.
Lore:	“He heard Frodo's voice, but it seemed to come from a great distance, or from under the earth, crying out strange words.”
Rarity:	U
